body:
I believe this is a regression with HEAD. Everything runs happily until I upgrade it to HEAD:

influx-grafana/                         influxdb                kubernetes/heapster_influxdb       kubernetes-minion-2.c.golden-system-455.internal/130.211.187.130   name=influxdb                Running

Then, I ssh into minion-2 and stop the kubelet. After this, all pods' status in cluster become to Unknown. Then I restart kubelet, and wait for long time (more than 20 mins), but all pods' status stay at Unknown:

```

POD                                     CONTAINER(S)            IMAGE(S)                           HOST                                                               LABELS                       STATUS
49d82109-9c1b-11e4-8e66-42010af0c136/   etcd                    quay.io/coreos/etcd:latest         kubernetes-minion-1.c.golden-system-455.internal/130.211.154.13    k8s-app=skydns               Unknown
                                        kube2sky                kubernetes/kube2sky:1.0                                                                                                            
                                        skydns                  kubernetes/skydns:2014-12-23-001                                                                                                   
4df66e9c-9c1b-11e4-8e66-42010af0c136/   elasticsearch-logging   dockerfile/elasticsearch           kubernetes-minion-3.c.golden-system-455.internal/130.211.180.220   name=elasticsearch-logging   Unknown
6d176b88-9c1b-11e4-8e66-42010af0c136/   kibana-logging          kubernetes/kibana:1.0              kubernetes-minion-1.c.golden-system-455.internal/130.211.154.13    name=kibana-logging          Unknown
test-termination-log/                   terminate1              busybox                            kubernetes-minion-4.c.golden-system-455.internal/130.211.154.170   <none>                       Unknown
                                        terminate2              busybox                                                                                                                            
influx-grafana/                         influxdb                kubernetes/heapster_influxdb       kubernetes-minion-2.c.golden-system-455.internal/130.211.187.130   name=influxdb                Unknown
                                        grafana                 kubernetes/heapster_grafana                                                                                                        
                                        elasticsearch           dockerfile/elasticsearch                                                                                                           
heapster/                               heapster                kubernetes/heapster                kubernetes-minion-2.c.golden-system-455.internal/130.211.187.130   name=heapster                Unknown
```

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a bug.
labels.name: kind/bug

labels.description: Highest priority. Must be actively worked on as someone's top priority right now.
labels.name: priority/critical-urgent

title: Regression: boundPods with etcd source will be killed by kubelet once a while
